title: always giving the "Downloading compiler 0.8.17" message but the hardhat does nothing
body:
### Version of Hardhat

2.15.0

### What happened?

I have a GitHub action runner to test my contracts but the hardhat is always giving the "Downloading compiler 0.8.17" message and the return code is still "0". I think this is a not good design and it's hard to find the problem where is
and I can not run `hardhat compile` and `hardhat deploy`

### Minimal reproduction steps


```
yarn
npx hardhat compile
```
here are my test logs
https://github.com/dbpunk-labs/db3/actions/runs/5582637254/jobs/10202126627?pr=564#step:7:30

### Search terms

_No response_
